idea-plugin.name: I Love DevToys
idea-plugin.description:
This free plugin is highly inspired from the DevToys software available on Windows: Base64, URL and JWT encoders/decoders, UUID, Lorem Ipsum and Hash generators, JSON, YAML, Timestamp converters, Graphics tools... Find these tools in a Tool Window in the top right corner of your IDE.
The global idea is to provide these tools on Linux and macOS (Windows is also supported), because the original DevToys software is available on Windows only.
